name: Trampolines
description:
Your task is to help the citizen of the beach dreamland to cross the cliff using a trampoline (currently just in a rectangle shape)

This android game is only a prototype for learning and I only use anything I can found on the internet,
Maybe I will continue this game if there is any feedback about the game

Currently only have 6 levels, multiplayer still not available since I don't have a server but the idea is there, and only the music volume slide bar will work (I'm just lazy to add the sound volume slide bar get to work),

How to play the game is in the image description,

Thank you

Credits:
GUI - https://craftpix.net/freebies/island-game-gui
Karakter - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-tiny-hero-sprites-pixel-art
Tileset - https://ansimuz.itch.io/magic-cliffs-environment
Background - https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-beach-2d-game-backgrounds
